description: Deletes a Cost Category. Expenses from this month going forward will no longer be categorized with this Cost Category.

parameters.name: CostCategoryArn
parameters.description: The unique identifier for your Cost Category.

nested_items.name: CostCategoryArn
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for your Cost Category.

nested_items.name: EffectiveEnd
nested_items.description: The effective end date of the Cost Category as a result of deleting it. No costs after this date is categorized by the deleted Cost Category.
